about_the_game:
In this game players take on the role of the Lord of Silver Heron Ridge, obtaining and using cards to summon creatures, cast spells, and defeat monsters as they battle through different regions and protect their kingdoms.

Game Features

  • Deck Building: Freely construct your own unique deck to craft a personalized battle strategy

  • Strategic Combat: Engage in deep tactical battles and relish the excitement of intellectual challenges

  • Team Collaboration: Connect with like-minded allies and showcase the power of teamwork

  • Fast-Paced Matches: Each battle is quick and intense, perfect for enjoying combat in your spare moments

  • Free Trading: Trade unique cards freely and fully embrace the joy of collecting

Class Overview

  • Mage: Dedicated to mastering magical energies, excelling at dealing area damage and controlling enemy forces

  • Priest: A faithful devotee who wields powerful healing and defensive spells to protect allies, while calling upon the Holy Light to scorch enemies

  • Ranger: With sharp instincts and agile movements, adept at dealing direct damage to enemy heroes, while their card control abilities pose a serious threat to opponents

  • Warrior: The embodiment of strength, courage, and conviction, boosting the offensive power of allies while using various abilities to inflict direct damage on enemies

short_description: Collect an array of creature and skill cards through quests, upgrades and trading, and craft your ultimate deck by choosing your favorite cards and prepare for epic battles. Dive into the exhilaration of strategic gameplay and let your inner tactician shine to outsmart your opponents!
